focallength: f=6.1 – 158.6 mm, equivalent to 24 – 624 mm on a 35 mm camera
exposuremode: Programmed AE, Aperture Priority AE, Shutter Priority AE, Manual
lcdscreensize: 3.0-inch, approx. 460,000 dots, TFT color, approx. 100% coverage LCD monitor
